column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////There were definitely service issues in this location as one waiter tried to drop off food that wasn't ours
column2: and then our bill at the end reflected chicken wings (an order for only $9.99) instead of our pizza and drinks.  We were tempted to just pay the bill we received after the cold food and bad service
column3: but moral values won out and we called the waitress's attention to it.
